clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease COPD

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: GSK159797 is a Beta2 agonist It works by relaxing the muscles that line the bronchial airways allowing the capacity of the airways to expand known as bronchodilation leading to the relief and or prevention of many of the symptoms of asthma and COPD
